attributes.action: Bring back full exams instead of mini assessments
attributes.background: All the mini exams are just so time wasting, stressful and one exam to finalise makes much more sense. We should bring back summer exams and finish our GCSEs and A Levels like this

rejection.details:
Don’t cancel GCSES and A-Levels in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554219

Give students the option to take exams or receive assessed grades for 2020/21: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559964
